stimulusHtml: The wheel on a vehicle has a rotational inertia of 2.0 kg⋅m<sup>2</sup>. At the instant the wheel has a counterclockwise angular velocity of 6.0 rad/s, an average counterclockwise torque of 5.0 N⋅m is applied, and continues for 4.0 s. What is the <u>change</u> in angular momentum of the wheel?
